head.supplied: [Delegate, 25 April 1887] ¶ ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ When I was here two years ago I collected some spec. of timber for Baron von Müller, the spec. by the Barons direction about the size of a brick or a little l...

div.p: Wilhelm Bäuerlen to Joseph Henry Maiden
MRS 202/107 special bundle, collector, Archives of the Museum of Applied Arts and Sciences, Ultimo, New South Wales.

When I was here two years ago I collected some spec. of timber for Baron von Müller, the spec. by the Barons direction about the size of a brick or a little larger. By a mistake all did not get sent away, so that there are a few duplicates left here, which being cut so long ago are quite dry now; they were nicely packed in a case with canvass round them to prevent splitting.
